name: 2023 8th International Conference on Biomedical Signal and Image Processing
content: Publication and Index: International Conference Proceedings: indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science) or Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), indexed by Scopus (Since 2021), Google Scholar, etc.
